title: Add Avantia logo to landing page

requirements.text: Add the Avantia logo (AVANTIA_LOGO.png) to the header/navigation area of the landing page, ensuring it's prominently displayed and properly sized for desktop and mobile views

quotes: Este es el Logo lo podrias agregar?

acceptanceCriteria: Logo is visible in the header/top section of the landing page
Logo maintains proper aspect ratio and quality
Logo is responsive and scales appropriately on mobile devices
Logo uses the uploaded AVANTIA_LOGO.png file as source

requirements.text: Render the generated Avantia logo as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Logo file is accessible from the frontend/public/assets/generated path
Image is properly imported and rendered in the component
No routing through backend is used for the logo asset

constraints: Do not edit immutable frontend paths: useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui
nonGoals: Changing the overall page layout structure
Modifying existing section components beyond adding the logo
Adding additional branding elements not specified

required: Avantia company logo with white text on blue background, brand colors #004AAD, modern geometric style with dynamic letter spacing (avantia-logo.dim_400x200.png)
